metadata.name: The Phoenix
metadata.description:
This is my re-genesis drop and it is called 'The Phoenix'. 

A spoken word piece with animated abstract visuals, The Phoenix is a tale of self empowerment. 

I came into the NFT space as a visual artist, with a lot to say. And somewhere along the way I found a voice. I found community. I made a choice to do more for the community than for myself. My inner artist was sidelined for a while there, as I worked toward mentoring younger artists and standing up for artist rights and mental health advocacy.
But now it’s time for a Renaissance. 
I came in as a visual artist. I still am one. But I made a choice. I found a voice. I became a voice… and with that I now bring you my renaissance.. my re-genesis as Angad the artist. 
The spoken word artist. 
The poet. 
Still building community. 
Still doing all the things I’ve been doing. But just giving you a little bit more of me. 

I wish everyone who watches this a very empowered life. 

Because.. empowered people empower people.
WAGMI
